name: COMP/CON Backup
summary: A COMPCON file is a backup file created by COMP/CON, an online content manager for the Lancer tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG). It contains a record of the characters, encounters, and missions a player has created in COMP/CON, as well as the content packs ( .LCP files) the player has imported. Players can create and load COMPCON files from COMP/CON's home screen.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: COMPCON file open in Apple TextEdit
images.alt: COMPCON file open in Apple TextEdit
